/circle6 Re-assess the woman and consider criteria for referral.
/circle6  Call a senior person, if available. Alert emergency 
transport services.
/circle6 Encourage the woman to empty her bladder.
/circle6 Ensure adequate hydration but omit solid foods.
/circle6  Encourage her to maintain an upright position and walk, 
if she wishes.
/circle6  Monitor intensively, using the partograph. Refer 
immediately if there is no progress.
